column1: Inflammation of the Nose due to an Allergy
column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Ihave tried everyone from benedryl, claritin, to zyrtec and none seem to work at a full day except ala-hist D. After my physician suggested I should try this first to see if it works, I was completely feeling better after just 2 days of taking it. I live in a state where weather change is every other day and my allergies are no help either. I find this drug very effective especially with anyone with severe allergies.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
VCS, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have tried many different prescription and OTC drugs: Xyzal, Clarinex, Claritin D, Alavert D, and more and Ala-hist D is the only drug effective enough to last all day.  After comparing active ingredients, Ala-Hist D has 25 mg diphenhydramine, 20mg phenylephrine and 6 mg brompheniramine maleato which pretty much blows all the others off the charts by comparison.  My only complaint about the drug is that I was not able to easily find it in retail drug stores and could only order it through my mail order prescription plan.  It was expenisve but very much worth it.
